page.title: 06A TYPICAL DAY.
page.content: In the morning I get up at 7.30 am. I get dressed and go downstairs. I play snooker while mum gets Rachel. At 8 o clock I feed the cat and if she gets in the way I only give her half. Rachel won't get up until 8.30. I have my breakfast and then leave the house to play on the rope swing which we call a Tarzie. Stephen Wearmouth comes for me at 8.30 and we go in the car to school. School finishes at 3.30. and I arrive home at 3.45. Steven Wearmouth calls for me at 4.00 and we play up thefield.At 5.30 I have my tea and then play toy fights with my dad.Rachel joins in and gets a bit out of control.Then me and dad play snooker for about 5 frames. I watch T.V. for an hour. At 8 pm me and Rachel have fights in my bedroom and throw things out the window.We both get sent to bed.
